news.title: The backstory behind the unions that bought a Chicago Sun-Times stake
news.summary: An investment group led by former Chicago alderman and businessman Edwin Eisendrath and the Chicago Federation of Labor recently pulled off an unusual feat when it acquired the Chicago Sun-Times.

news.title: The backstory behind the unions that bought a Chicago Sun-Times stake
news.summary: In the 1920’s, unions used written publications and radio shows to counter anti-immigrant and anti-labor feelings This piece originally appeared on The Conversation.
